text: Altererythrobacter soli is a Gram-negative, strictly aerobic and rod-shaped bacterium from the genus of Altererythrobacter which has been isolated from desert sand from the Tengger desert. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Altererythrobacter soli at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2017
title: Altererythrobacter soli
